participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Emily enjoys socializing and meeting new people. She is determined and hardworking, balancing her job and studies.
participant_1.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Jack finds joy in simple pleasures like baking and crafting. He is supportive and enjoys helping others pursue their passions.
participant_2.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: i just finished walking my dog
